task_name: Implement Jint Engine Wrapper and Sandboxing
resource_notes: Requires deep understanding of Jint security constraints and .NET resource management. High-risk task.
alternative_approach: Could be assigned to a mid-level developer but would require 50% more time and extensive review from Lead Architect.
risk_factors: Incorrect sandboxing configuration could lead to a critical security vulnerability (RISK-001).
mitigation_strategy: Dedicated security-focused code review by Lead Architect. Implement automated tests for each security constraint.

resource_notes: Requires expertise in integrating complex third-party React components and managing bundler configurations.
alternative_approach: Use a simpler editor component, but this would fail to meet the requirements for real-time validation (US-045).
risk_factors: Single point of failure for frontend expertise. Monaco Editor can be complex to configure and optimize.
mitigation_strategy: Allocate R&D spike time. Ensure robust component testing. Pair with a backend dev to understand JS engine parity.

task_name: Implement Plug-in Loader Service with AssemblyLoadContext
resource_notes: Architecturally critical task. Requires expertise in .NET internals to prevent dependency conflicts and memory leaks.
alternative_approach: A simpler loading mechanism without AssemblyLoadContext, but this would introduce high risk of dependency hell (RISK-002).
risk_factors: High risk of service instability if implemented incorrectly. A single faulty plug-in could crash the main application.
mitigation_strategy: Implement with extensive integration testing using sample 'good', 'bad', and 'conflicting' plug-ins. Rigorous code review.

resource_notes: Requires a dedicated QA Engineer to create and maintain the test. Needs coordination with DevOps for CI integration.
alternative_approach: Manual performance testing, but this is not repeatable and fails to meet NFR enforcement requirements.
risk_factors: CI environment variability could lead to flaky test results (RISK-004).
mitigation_strategy: Run tests on dedicated, standardized CI agents. Document the expected hardware baseline for the benchmark.
